attributes.action: If EU withdrawl agreement fails in parliament. IMMEDIATELY WITHDRAW ARTICLE 50.
attributes.background: I run a business that deals in the EU, I know that immigration policy could have been changed years ago to something more palatable to Brits. I know the Brexit campaign is being led by people like Nigel Farage, Boris Johnson & Reese Mogg, all of whom will not be affected by 50 years of poverty in UK
